title: #D32 Import PDF files in Power BI automatically from your local folder
excerpt: In todays video I will show you how to import PDF files in Power BI in bulk from your local folder.  To download the file, go to Curbal's download center and the communty downloads and get gile #32: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1
